BBEX3.M.HRK.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Croatia / USD 1 = HRK ... (middle)

General: With effect from 30 May 1994, the kuna (HRK) was introduced as Croatia's new legal tender. The Croatian dinar (CRD) was converted to kuna at a rate of CRD 1,000 = HRK 1; the Croatian dinar could be exchanged for kuna at this rate until 31 December 1994.
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: Since October 2010: Croatian National Bank, Zagreb. May 1994 - September 2010: Zagrebacka Banka, Zagreb.
